name: He SiYuan
wishText: I Prepared a few Gifts for You!)
textInChatBox: I hope You are Happy every day! May many many Happy surround You...
text2: It's also the 69th day Since we've known each other.
text3: It's always excited to get along with you every moment.
text4: I realize, I must do something
outroText: Hope We can always be this so Sweet!
